activities: ORC International, Inc. (ORC) may receive the following personal information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:  (1) human resources information; (2) customer/supplier/prospect information; (3) survey/panel participant information.  ORC may use the first two sources of information for its internal business purposes.  ORC may use the third source of information in connection with services provided to its clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line, off-line, manually processed data, human resources data, organization, client, customer, panel/survey
recoursemech: ORC International, Inc. will comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
